kernfrasen: God’s right hand and God’s left hand

both of the Lord’s hands can be trusted
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: GOD IS A PHYSICAL AGENT WITH HANDS

kernfrasen: the kind of life God called him into
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: LIFE IS A JOURNEY / THINKING IS FOLLOWING A PATH

cognitieve_implicaties: God is physically active in disasters
Suffering is not accidental but a 'hand' of God
ethische_implicaties: Trust in God even when His actions seem 'clumsy' or 'alien'
Submission to divine will during catastrophe
onbedoelde_consequenties: God as the direct cause of an airplane crash

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher revitalizes the dead metaphor of 'God's hand' by introducing the 'Left Hand' as a specific, jarring category for suffering.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The sermon centers entirely on the 'Two Hands' metaphor to resolve the tension between God's goodness and the reality of evil.

incoherentie_punten.metafoor_a: GOD IS A BIASED COMBATANT (Israel vs Egypt)
incoherentie_punten.metafoor_b: GOD IS AN IMPARTIAL OBSERVER (God's point of view)
incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: The preacher claims the Bible is written from 'God's point of view' (neutral/transcendent) while using examples where God clearly takes sides (Israel).
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: If God has a 'point of view' above all, the 'Right Hand' cannot be exclusively for one side.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The 'Hands' provide the action, while 'Counsel' provides the rationale, unified in the person of the 'Lord Almighty'.

sterktes.beschrijving: Takes the conventional 'Hand of God' and splits it to create a cognitive category for 'Alien Work'.
sterktes.voorbeeld: I apologize to all the left-handed people present for what must seem to you to be a very unjust metaphor.

risicos.beschrijving: The metaphor of God 'reaching into wreckage' can lead to a crude view of causality.
risicos.voorbeeld: as if God had reached right down into the wreckage and snatched this person out.
risicos.potentiele_impact: Hearers may blame God directly for the death of those not 'snatched'.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: A cosmic workshop where God uses two different hands to shape history.
sub_worlds: The wreckage of an airplane crash
The battlefields of the American Civil War
A modern university chapel without a cross

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: Highly effective for contextualizing the 'point of view' problem.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Reinforces that nothing is 'out of control' even when it feels so.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Introduces the 'Alien Work' which is painful and 'strange'.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Fits the 'Wednesday night' context of deep theological reflection.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the 'GOD AS AGENT' domain, specifically using the 'HANDS' as the primary cognitive tool. It successfully moves from a simple 'God is good' schema to a more complex 'God is complexly good' schema via the Right/Left hand distinction.

revitalisatie_suggesties.huidige_status: Risk of being seen as 'God is the author of evil'.
revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Deepen the 'Source Domain' of the Left Hand by using the 'Sculptor' metaphor.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The left hand steadies the stone while the right hand strikes the chisel; both are necessary for the statue.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: The 'God's point of view' vs 'God's partisan right hand'.
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Clarify that the 'Right Hand' is God's ultimate purpose for *all*, even if experienced as the 'Left Hand' by some temporarily.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: Implies death is a person/entity one can sign a contract with.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Clarify this as a 'suicide pact' with false security.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To explain why some parts of the building (life) are demolished to make room for the new.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using a single conceptual metaphor to provide a cognitive 'hook' for a difficult theological problem.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Focuses on the logical entailments of 'hands' rather than the beauty of the prose.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Analyzes the mental mapping of the 'Left Hand' rather than just the experiential learning cycle.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals how the preacher uses 'Hand' as a container for both mercy and judgment to prevent the hearer from abandoning the 'God is in control' schema.

volledige_metafoor_lijst: grinding the faces of the poor
appendices.notities: The sermon relies heavily on the Lutheran distinction of Law and Gospel mapped onto physical anatomy.
